label: CODE
description: Over 10 years of experience in writing beautiful code that always works! Reliable code is hard to come by isn't it?

label: MOBILE
description: If there could a website, then thou might not but hast an app for't as well

label: UX
description: I don't merely make it work, I like to extend the magic with applications that connect on a human level. And for that, my process includes ideating every possible facet, emotion, persuassion, usability. I consider psychological biases, human decision making process and its drives. It's a science and I know it!

label: DESIGN
description: Applications with exquisite designs are perceived to work immaculately as well. I  spend my time in a land where Art and Science meet. It's a small and relatively unknown place, but I have found it.

label: FUN
description: It's not worth it if it ain't fun. I believe in co-creation. I don't shove ideas with a take-it-or-leave-it approach, I like to chase the dream. Your dream.

label: LIFE
